attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ask the changing of the london 2012 logo, as it is confusing, of poor quality and does not represent or appeal to the British Puclic. The previous 'candidate city' logo has a wider base of appeal and is popular amongst the public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
